attributes.action: If Cadbury sell to Kraft their Royal Warrant should be removed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Cadbury sell to Kraft they should have their Royal Warrant removed because they have sold off such an iconic Britsh brand.

rejection.details: Please contact the Royal Households with your suggestion.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
